metadata.name: Cold
metadata.description:
“Cold” White Tiger

Created as part of an exclusive series called “Geometric Animals”, a series of illustrations of animals with a geometric style developed over six years (2015 - 2021).
The style popularly known as "low poly" was chosen to carry out the designs and consists of creating triangles manually, which through the use of colors, sizes and angles allow to give rise to this series of unique pieces.

This is a signed and unique digital creation created by digital artist DesignGeo.
